text: to the Wagah border crossing where we
are expecting to see the release of the
Indian pilot a beam and invert the man
who is apparently going to be released
by Pakistan
Imran Khan the Prime Minister said that
they would release him today and
Pakistan shot down the Indian plane on
Wednesday there was great despair
amongst many in India at seeing that
pilot captured there was footage
released by the Pakistanis showing his
face bloodied he'd been attacked by a
mob on the ground when he was picked up
and then he was shown again in further
footage drinking tea and Imran Khan
saying his return to India should be
seen as a gesture of peace others in
India saying of course they very much
hope he will be released but Pakistan
has now got to move against the
militants they say are active in Kashmir
and based in Pakistan and sponsored by
Pakistan these are the crowds that are
gathered on the Indian side of the Wagah
crossing you can see public crowds a lot
of journalists and military there and we
are waiting to see this pilot release
embarrassin what will happen to him once
he is handed over to India because he
won't go straight back into his job or
into civilian life willing first and
foremost or they will be conducting a
debriefing session with him they have to
do a medical check-up
then they need to have a detail to chat
about what exactly happened the
circumstances are leading to his
aircraft crashing into the Pakistani
side and then subsequently how he was
captured and how he was fitted so there
will be a very lengthy debriefing
procedure and of course they will also
carry out a detailed medical check-up
whether he was tortured or whether he
was subjected to any kind of pressure
under the custody of Pakistan before he
will be allowed to see his family what
we understand is
parents are now in the capital Delhi and
they are waiting for further
instructions
from the Indian authorities so and once
the formalities are completed at the
volga border between India and Pakistan
he will be brought to Delhi to see his
family and there some newspapers are
